properties.putsql-sql-statement:
UPDATE public.processes 
SET 
  status = 'Progress',
  targetjson = '${fullrecordjolt}',
  "timestamp" = '${now():format("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'")}'
WHERE 
  transactionid = '${transactionId}' 
  AND objectname = 'customer' 
  AND eventtype = 'createCustomer';

UPDATE public.processes 
SET 
  status = 'Success',
  "timestamp" = '${now():format("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'")}'
WHERE 
  transactionid = '${transactionId}' 
  AND objectname = 'customer' 
  AND eventtype = 'createCustomer';

UPDATE public.processes 
SET 
  status = 'Error',
  error = 'HTTP ${invokehttp.status.code} ${invokehttp.status.message}: ${invokehttp.response.body}',
  "timestamp" = '${now():format("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'")}'
WHERE 
  transactionid = '${transactionId}' 
  AND objectname = 'customer' 
  AND eventtype = 'createCustomer';
